resources.string: Do you really want to quite game?
Do you really want to finish level? progress will not be saved
No saved game! Please start a new game
You must complete all the puzzles in this window before you can progress to the next
You are the best! no levels left in the game!
This is first level, no going back yet
You must pass the level in story mode first
The leader of the herd is usually the oldest female – she is called the Matriarch
Elephants are so clever they can peel their own bananas, corn and lots of other food.
An elephant lives on average to the age of 70 – the same as humans
Owls have powerful talons (claws) which help them catch and kill prey.
The color of owl’s feathers helps them blend into their environment (camouflage).
There are around 200 different owl species.
Koalas have similar fingerprints to humans.
Koala fossils found in Australia have been dated as long ago as 20 million years.
A baby koala is called a ‘joey’
Baby Koalas live in their mother’s pouch for around six months and remain with them for another six months or so afterwards.
Koalas eat eucalypt leaves and almost nothing else.
Show Random Fact about this animal
Wild elephants live in families called herds – herds are made up of female elephants.
In the wild, a mother elephant has help with the babies from other elephants – who are known as Aunties. A new mother will choose her aunties and together they will raise the baby.
Owls can turn their heads as much as 270 degrees.

Welcome to Fix My Picture.A horrible thing has happened!the pictures of our favourite animals has shifted!We need your help in putting the pictures back in the original order.Would you like to see the tutorial?

In this game you are asked to reorganize the picture pieces by moving them around.however, it is only possible to move adjacent tile to an empty tile.this will cause the empty tile and the other tile switch placesOur goal is to organize the picture pieces to form a whole picture exactly like the originalwith only the empty tile being in the bottom right corner.Goodluck!
